job_description:
Pre-Sales Consultant - Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central

We are seeking a highly skilled Presales Consultant with a strong focus on Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central (BC). This role requires excellent functional knowledge and client engagement skills to support the sales team in delivering product demonstrations, preparing solution proposals, and designing compelling solutions based on client needs.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Presales & Solution Consulting - Conduct product demonstrations, Proof of Concepts (POCs), and workshops tailored to specific client requirements. - Lead requirement discovery sessions to understand business challenges and propose effective BC solutions. - Create high-quality solution blueprints, value propositions, and presales documentation. - Develop process flows, solution architecture overviews, and module-level conceptual designs. - Prepare competitive and compelling proposals, Bills of Quantities (BOQs), and Request for Proposal/Information (RFP/RFI) responses.

2. Sales Support - Collaborate with the sales team during prospecting, qualification, and client presentations. - Assist in building sales strategies and positioning Business Central against competitor ERPs (e.g., SAP B1, Odoo, NetSuite, Tally Prime+). - Support commercial discussions by providing clear solution clarifications and scope boundaries. - Demonstrate Return on Investment (ROI) through business cases, cost-benefit analysis, and productivity improvement metrics.

3. Product Expertise - Stay updated on the latest Business Central features, updates, and the Microsoft roadmap. - Demonstrate best practices across core BC modules: Finance, Sales, Purchase, Inventory, Warehouse, Projects, and basic Manufacturing. - Prepare customized demo environments for various industry verticals.

4. Proposal & Documentation - Prepare detailed presales assets including: - Functional scope - Fit-Gap analysis - Implementation timeline - User license requirements - Pricing and commercials - Solution deck presentations - Work closely with delivery teams to ensure proposals align with implementation feasibility.

5. Collaboration - Coordinate with Functional Consultants, Technical Consultants, Developers, and Project Managers. - Provide knowledge transfer to internal teams regarding proposed solutions. - Support marketing efforts with product content, webinars, whitepapers, and case studies.

Required Expertise & Skills:

Must-Have: - 5+ years of experience in Dynamics 365 Business Central / NAV (Functional + Presales). - Strong business process knowledge in Finance, Supply Chain, Procurement, Inventory, and Projects. - Excellent presentation skills (both online and onsite). - Ability to translate business pain points into compelling solution stories. - Skilled in preparing presales artifacts: proposals, presentations (PPTs), capability decks, Statements of Work (SOW) inputs. - Experience conducting C-level discussions and leading workshops. - Strong documentation skills.

Good to Have: - Experience with Power BI, Power Automate, and other Microsoft ecosystem tools. - Knowledge of Manufacturing and Service Management modules. - Experience with cloud migration (NAV to BC). - Microsoft certification (MB-800 or related). - Familiarity with AL extensions (basic understanding).

job_description:
Cloud DevOps Engineer

We are seeking an experienced Cloud DevOps Engineer with strong expertise in designing, building, and operating secure, large-scale, multi-tenant cloud platforms. The ideal candidate will have deep hands-on experience with Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), cloud networking, data platform components, automation, and operational support for high-availability environments.

Responsibilities

  • Build and configure cloud environments using IaC tools (Terraform, Bicep, ARM, or similar).
  • Implement multi-tenant infrastructure with complete isolation across compute, storage, identity, and networking layers.
  • Deploy core platform components such as:
    • Cloud storage and database services
    • Data processing and analytics services
    • Workload orchestration, compute clusters, and metadata/catalog tools
  • Design and configure cloud networking, including VNets, private endpoints, firewalls, routing, and secure API access.
  • Implement HA/DR configurations, backup policies, and monitoring foundations.
  • Develop reusable IaC modules and provisioning templates for onboarding new environments or tenants.
  • Build CI/CD workflows for infrastructure deployment and configuration changes.
  • Automate operational tasks such as environment creation, access setup, and network configuration.
  • Monitor cloud resources, compute performance, network connectivity, and storage systems.
  • Troubleshoot infrastructure issues across compute, identity, storage, and networking.
  • Apply patches, upgrades, and configuration changes in line with best practices.
  • Optimize cloud performance and cost across compute, storage, and networking workloads.
  • Support onboarding of new teams or business units by provisioning secure and isolated environments.
  • Maintain detailed documentation for infrastructure, IaC modules, network diagrams, and operational procedures.
  • Train internal teams on cloud administration, IaC usage, monitoring tools, and day-to-day cloud operations.

Key Skills Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience as a Cloud Engineer or similar role.
  • Strong, hands-on experience with Azure or another primary cloud provider.
  • Advanced proficiency in IaC tools (ARM, Terraform preferred).
  • Strong understanding of multi-tenant architecture, resource isolation, and cloud governance.
  • Hands-on experience with cloud networking (firewalls, routing, VPN, private endpoints).
  • Familiarity with data platform components such as analytics engines, metadata catalogs, and orchestration services.
  • Experience with CI/CD, Git, and automation pipelines.
  • Excellent troubleshooting and performance optimization skills.

Preferred Certifications

  • Azure Administrator / Azure Solutions Architect
  • Terraform Associate
  • Cloud Security or Networking certifications

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@beinex.com
summary: Seeking a Cloud DevOps Engineer to build and operate secure, multi-tenant cloud platforms using IaC and automation. Responsibilities include infrastructure deployment, networking, monitoring, and operational support.

job_description:
Security Architect

We are hiring an experienced Security Architect with deep expertise in cloud security, identity management, data protection, and compliance frameworks. The role focuses on designing and implementing security architectures for multi-tenant cloud platforms, ensuring isolation, privacy, encryption, and operational security aligned with best practices.

Responsibilities:

  • Define end-to-end cloud security architectures with emphasis on multi-tenant isolation, secure data flows, and identity governance.
  • Design IAM models including RBAC, MFA, privilege separation, and zero-trust principles.
  • Architect encryption strategies for data at rest and in transit, key management, secret rotation, and certificate handling.
  • Embed privacy-by-design and compliance-by-design into platform and component architectures.
  • Design and validate access patterns, audit logging strategies, and monitoring frameworks.
  • Develop governance models covering change management, incident response, data classification, and retention.
  • Configure identity, access controls, network security rules, encryption, certificates, and monitoring agents.
  • Perform hardening of cloud resources, compute clusters, storage, and data services according to industry standards.
  • Integrate security tools for data discovery, classification, access governance, encryption policy enforcement, and auditability.
  • Support vulnerability assessments, penetration tests, and risk remediation.
  • Establish dashboards and alerts for security monitoring using SIEM tools.
  • Lead threat analysis, incident response, forensic investigations, and root cause analysis.
  • Conduct regular access reviews, configuration audits, and isolation checks.
  • Oversee security patching, baseline updates, identity audits, and configuration compliance.
  • Ensure operational security coverage across all tenants/environments.
  • Produce security SOPs, runbooks, incident response plans, and governance workflows.
  • Deliver security training for engineering, operations, and administrative teams.
  • Ensure full documentation and knowledge transfer for ongoing operational security activities.

Key Skills Requirements:

  • 7+ years of experience in cybersecurity, cloud security architecture, or related domains.
  • Deep expertise with cloud IAM, RBAC, authentication flows, and identity governance.
  • Strong knowledge of cloud networking security (firewalls, segmentation, VPN, private networking).
  • Hands-on experience with data security tools (classification, cataloging, access governance, encryption management).
  • Expertise in encryption, key management, audit logging, and SIEM/SOAR.
  • Understanding of multi-tenant security challenges and proven ability to design secure isolation patterns.
  • Strong understanding of compliance, data protection, and privacy principles.

Preferred Certifications:

  • CISSP, CCSP, CISSA
  • Azure Security Engineer / Cloud Security certifications
  • ISO 27001 or other governance framework certifications

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@beinex.com
summary: Seeking a Security Architect with cloud security and identity management expertise. Role involves designing and implementing secure multi-tenant cloud architectures, focusing on isolation, privacy, and compliance.

job_description:
C/C++ Developer - 4G/5G Core Network

PIT Solutions (P) Ltd Module No. 209-N, 9th Floor, Yamuna, SEZ IT Building, Technopark Phase III, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India , 695583 http://www.pitsolutions.com

Closing Date: 12, Dec 2025 Job Published: 28, Nov 2025 Contact Email: careers@pitsolutions.com

Brief Description

  • Experience: 5-15 years
  • Work location: Trivandrum
  • Contract: 11-month contract, renewable based on project requirements and performance.

About the Role

We are looking for an experienced C/C++ Developer with a strong foundation in 4G/5G Core Network technologies. The role involves building low-level components that sit close to the protocol and signalling layers, ensuring that control-plane and user-plane workflows behave as expected in real-world environments. You will contribute directly to the development lifecycle, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and help strengthen core network stability, performance, and standards compliance.

Key Responsibilities

Core Network Development

  • Design and develop C/C++ modules for 4G/5G core elements on Linux.
  • Implement and optimize telecom protocols across signalling and data layers.
  • Work with interfaces such as NGAP, S1AP, XnAP, Diameter, GTP, PFCP, HTTP2/SBI, SCTP, NAS, and SIP.
  • Ensure alignment with industry specifications and maintain accurate behaviour across network scenarios.

Testing & Troubleshooting

  • Conduct unit, integration, and regression testing of core modules.
  • Support analysis and resolution of issues raised during lab validation or live environment testing.
  • Collaborate with teams handling adjacent nodes to ensure smooth interoperability.

Agile Collaboration & Delivery

  • Participate in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
  • Work closely with architects, QA teams, and protocol specialists to ensure stable releases.
  • Maintain clarity in communication and documentation across the development lifecycle.

Required Skills & Experience

Programming & Systems Expertise

  • Strong hands-on experience in C/C++ development on Linux.
  • Understanding of memory handling, multithreading, and performance-critical code paths.
  • Familiarity with debugging tools, profiling utilities, and system-level troubleshooting.

4G/5G Core Network Knowledge

  • Solid grasp of core network functions and call flows (AMF, SMF, MME, SGW, PGW).
  • Experience working with 3GPP standards and telecom protocol stacks.
  • Practical exposure to control-plane and user-plane interactions.

Protocol-Level Experience

  • Working knowledge of one or more core signalling interfaces:
    • NGAP, S1AP, XnAP, NAS
    • Diameter, GTP, PFCP
    • SCTP, SIP, HTTP2/SBI

Preferred Skills

  • Exposure to SDN/NFV concepts, virtualized network functions, and cloud-native architectures.
  • Familiarity with Kubernetes or containerized deployments.
  • Experience with CI/CD workflows, automated testing, and build pipelines.
  • Understanding of distributed systems or microservice design.

Soft Skills

  • Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving approach.
  • Ability to understand complex network behaviour and reason through edge scenarios.
  • Clear communication and willingness to collaborate closely with cross-functional teams.
  • Commitment to responsible engineering and continuous learning.

Contact: careers@pitsolutions.com
summary: Experienced C/C++ Developer for 4G/5G Core Network on Linux. Focus on low-level components, protocol optimization, and network stability.

job_description:
Senior SQL Server DBA - AWS Migration & High Availability

Company: MUTHOOT PAPPACHAN TECHNOLOGIES LTD

Contact Email: vidhya.r@muthoot.com

Website: https://www.mptglobal.com

Address: 14th FLOOR, CARNIVAL TECHNOPARK, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM P.O., TRIVANDRUM, 695581

Closing Date: 31, December 2025 Job Published: 27, November 2025

Job Overview

Job Title: Senior SQL Server DBA - AWS Migration & High Availability Industry: NBFC (Non-Banking Financial Company) Location: Trivandrum, Kerala Experience: 5 to 12 years Employment Type: Full-time Working Mode: Work from office

Job Summary

We are seeking an experienced Senior SQL Server DBA to join our Database Team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing, optimizing, and securing AWS database solutions, ensuring seamless integration with our existing financial applications.

Key Responsibilities:

SQL Server Migration

  • Hands-on experience migrating SQL Server from on-premises to AWS/cloud using AWS DMS, ensuring seamless data transfer with minimal downtime.
  • Expertise in migrating via AWS DMS service using the Change Data Capture (CDC) approach.
  • Experience in handling temporal tables during migration to ensure historical data consistency.

High Availability & Disaster Recovery (HA/DR)

  • Expertise in Always On Availability Groups, Failover Clustering, Log Shipping, and Replication to ensure high availability and disaster recovery.

Failover & Failback Strategies

  • Implement and manage failover and failback strategies to ensure business continuity with minimal impact during planned or unplanned outages.

Database Maintenance & Optimization

  • Perform database server maintenance to ensure high availability and reliability.
  • Improve database performance through query tuning and index management.
  • Resolve database deadlocks, performance bottlenecks, and conflicts effectively.

Performance Monitoring & Troubleshooting

  • Troubleshoot database-related issues, including performance bottlenecks and errors.
  • Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems.
  • Utilize database monitoring tools to track performance and ensure smooth operations.
  • Review logs to proactively identify and address issues.
  • Use SQL Profiler, Extended Events, Performance Monitor, Query Store, DMVs, and SolarWinds for proactive monitoring.

Query Optimization & Execution Plans

  • Improve database efficiency by analyzing execution plans, optimizing stored procedures, and reducing query execution time.

Database Workload Management

  • Monitor, analyze, and fine-tune database workloads to prevent bottlenecks and optimize throughput.

Real-Time Data Replication

  • Hands-on experience in real-time data replication and synchronization across hybrid environments (on-premises and cloud) using the DMS service.

Database Automation

  • Automate deployment, migration, scaling, and maintenance using PowerShell, CloudFormation, Terraform, and AWS Lambda.

Backup & Recovery

  • Implement robust backup and recovery procedures to safeguard data integrity.
  • Regularly test backup and disaster recovery strategies to ensure minimal downtime.
  • Implement and maintain backup, recovery, and disaster recovery strategies for AWS-hosted databases.

Security & Compliance

  • Assess database security standards, including access controls and auditing.
  • Ensure compliance with organizational policies and regulatory requirements.
  • Implement best practices for encryption, auditing, and role-based access control (RBAC).

Collaboration & Issue Resolution

  • Collaborate with developers to resolve query inefficiencies and improve application integration.
  • Work closely with the development team to optimize database performance.
  • Coordinate with DevOps and cloud engineering teams to enhance database integration and system performance.

AWS Database Services

  • Design, implement, and manage AWS database services such as Amazon RDS, Aurora, DynamoDB, Redshift, Athena, Glue, and other AWS data solutions.
  • Ensure seamless integration of AWS databases with on-premises and cloud-based applications.

Additional Experience

  • Experience in provisioning and managing DB clusters for HA production environments.

Preferred Skills

  • SQL Server DBA
  • AWS Migration
  • High Availability

Contact: vidhya.r@muthoot.com
summary: Seeking a Senior SQL Server DBA for AWS migration and HA. Responsibilities include managing, optimizing, and securing AWS databases with minimal downtime.

The ideal candidate will possess strong experience with HubSpot CRM (including automation and AI features) and the ability to coordinate effectively between UK and India teams. This role is responsible for managing day-to-day marketing operations, coordinating content and campaigns, using automation to increase efficiency, and tracking performance through CRM and analytics tools.

  • Support the execution of marketing plans and campaigns in collaboration with the global marketing team.

  • Coordinate social media posts, email campaigns, and digital content with internal teams.

  • Support campaign planning, execution, and follow-up to ensure consistent messaging and output.

  • Provide weekly updates on progress, blockers, and completed deliverables.

3. Market & Competitor Analysis

  • Conduct light market research to identify trends, audience shifts, and competitor positioning.
  • Support benchmarking activities to improve messaging, branding, or campaign direction.
  • Feed insights into campaign strategy, product positioning, and content relevance.
  • Track changes in digital engagement, industry events, or sector-specific opportunities.

4. Performance Tracking & CRM Reporting

  • Measure and report marketing KPIs such as: Lead generation (Marketing Leads vs Sales Qualified Leads), Campaign engagement (clicks, impressions, downloads, form fills), Traffic sources (email, LinkedIn, website, referrals).
  • Track conversions and attribution using HubSpot CRM.
  • Share weekly or monthly dashboards with Sales and Leadership.
  • Optimize campaigns based on data insights and performance metrics.

5. AI & Automation

  • Use HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks.
  • Leverage tools like ChatGPT, Canva AI, Grammarly, Jasper, etc., for content support.
  • Improve efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates.
  • Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Preferred Skills:

Required:

  • Proficiency with HubSpot CRM (marketing tools, automation, workflows).
  • Experience with digital content coordination and campaign execution.
  • Strong organizational and communication skills.
  • Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and deliverables.
  • Familiarity with Canva, Google Workspace, MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Docs).
  • Good command in English (both verbal and written).
  • 2–4 years in marketing coordination, campaign support, or CRM-based marketing.

Bonus / Preferred:

  • Knowledge of CMS, marketing automation tools, or social publishing tools.
  • Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva AI, Grammarly).
  • Prior experience supporting UK/Europe teams.
  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or equivalent.

The Finance Associate will manage the full-cycle accounting and financial analysis for multiple international business units:

  • End-to-End Accounting: Handling the complete accounting lifecycle for UK, Ireland, and US entities, including general ledger maintenance, accounts payable, accounts receivable, and fixed assets.

  • Systems Proficiency: Strong proficiency in MS Excel and practical experience using a recognized ERP system (e.g., SAP, Oracle, NetSuite).
  • Communication: Excellent analytical, organizational, and communication skills to interact with global teams.

Important Note to Applicants: We kindly request that only candidates with the specified 3-5 years of experience AND demonstrable, direct experience in international (UK/Ireland/US) accounting apply. Submissions from irrelevant candidates will be screened out and will not be considered.

The Process Excellence Delivery Manager will oversee and implement transformation initiatives to drive continual improvement within GSI. This role will ensure process, system, and behavior improvement opportunities are identified, enhanced, and managed to meet internal and external customer business requirements. The individual in this role requires a deep understanding of Insurance Operations (i.e., Underwriting, Claims, Finance, & Risk), their customer and business requirements, and how to efficiently embed and deploy lean transformation methodology at senior leadership and frontline staff levels to deliver sustainable results. This role will require close partnership with various stakeholders to drive effective execution and will play a pivotal role in executing the strategy as directed by the Deputy Chief Transformation Officer and Service Delivery Head of Global Insurance Operations at GSI.

Responsibilities and Accountabilities:

  • Work closely with the Deputy Chief Transformation Officer & Service Delivery Head of Global Insurance Operations at GSI to develop a transformation roadmap to meet the desired outcomes of GSI.
  • Lead the execution of the Transformation roadmap with specific responsibility for initiatives and continuous improvement practices and routines.
  • Guide the current state and future state, standard work design, implementation plan, along with defining the impact, value, and prioritization of changes (in strong cooperation with business or service unit experts).
  • Analyze customer & business requirements through voice of the customer meetings; evaluating current processes and systems; and data collection and review.
  • Conduct detailed root cause analysis by working closely with stakeholders to understand issues originating in upstream/downstream process areas.
  • Facilitate sessions using lean problem-solving techniques (i.e., Fishbone analysis) so all relevant stakeholders can communicate business-critical issues in root cause language.
  • Use a standard set of Lean/Problem Solving tools and analyses to develop insight, solutions, and drive the consistent use of Lean standards in the delivery of agreed-upon outcomes.
  • Successfully implement identified improvements (i.e., Process, Tools, artifact enhancements, and performance transparency) that have the greatest value to enable an efficient end-to-end process as defined by the Deputy CTO and business/functional units.
  • Work with business to ensure support structures are in place to enable timely task completion and ensure the right people are aligned to the right task.
  • Work with cross-functional team(s) for effective and timely issue resolution.
  • Coach senior leaders to be effective in their roles as sponsors; and coach leaders at all levels on their role to support and sustain continuous improvement in their area, including their own management practices and routines and capture performance standards.
  • Embed routines/behaviors that drive activities to be completed timely and drive ongoing continuous improvement efforts.

Skills and Requirements:

  • Insurance knowledge and strong business acumen.
  • Excellent communication, listening, and facilitation skills to effectively engage with stakeholders.
  • Effective decision-making and critical thinking skills.
  • Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret data to drive business decisions.
  • Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and deliver effective consulting and coaching.
  • Strategic, Operational, and Analytical thinking.
  • Cross-functional & Matrix engagement.
  • Detail-oriented with a high level of personal accountability.
  • Lean or similar certification, or experience implementing continuous improvement principles in service environments/organizations (e.g., Business Agility, Lean management techniques, Six Sigma certification, etc.).
  • Lean Transformation experience.
  • Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail.
  • High Emotional Quotient and Professionalism.
  • High degree of integrity and ability to handle confidential matters and sensitive situations with discretion.

Education and Experience:

  • 7+ years of experience as a Lean management leader with demonstrated success in leading end-to-end transformational changes.
  • Experience in insurance industries and an understanding of operational management practices.
  • Self-motivated, prone to action, autonomous, and results-oriented with the ability to lead multiple complex initiatives (short, mid, and long-term) with impact.
  • Proven track record developing and/or implementing Lean/continuous improvement initiatives.
  • Demonstrated ability to effectively interpret data and measure performance.
  • Ability to handle changing priorities and use good judgment when working in challenging situations.
  • Ability to build a strong network of relationships across the company, quickly building credibility and gaining the trust and confidence of colleagues.
  • A change agent, excellent at managing change both at an organizational level and at an individual level.
  • Superior oral and written communication skills, as well as attention to detail while developing and presenting to senior leaders of the company.
  • Deep knowledge and demonstrated application of change management principles, practices, methodologies, and tools.
  • Exceptional presentation, written, and verbal communication skills with demonstrated ability to develop compelling messaging for diverse audiences.
  • Demonstrate proficiency in project and program management.
  • Demonstrate proficiency in data mining and analysis.
  • Bachelor’s degree with related experience or Master’s in a related field required. Work experience may substitute for the education requirement.
  • Professional Lean Certification (is a plus).
summary: Manage transformation initiatives for continuous improvement in GSI. Requires insurance operations knowledge and lean methodology deployment for sustainable results.

job_description:

About Us

Way.com is America's dominant automotive super app, serving over 10 million customers with services spanning auto insurance, parking, EV charging, and more. We utilize cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and data analytics to provide innovative solutions for car ownership. Recognized by Bloomberg and Andreessen Horowitz, we are transforming the automotive industry.

Job Title

Finance Executive/ Financial Analyst

Work Arrangement

On-site

Employment Type

Full-time

Role Overview

We are seeking a results-driven, CA-qualified Finance Professional with 2-3 years of experience in FP&A, accounting, financial reporting, and reconciliations. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience working with businesses, preparing financial statements, managing AR/AP processes, and utilizing ERP systems.

Key Responsibilities

Financial Planning & Analysis - Act as a business partner to drive financial analysis and provide insights into financial performance. - Coordinate and lead annual, quarterly, and monthly forecasts. - Manage month-end close activities. - Analyze forecast vs. actuals and identify key drivers.

Financial Accounting & Reporting - Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements in compliance with accounting standards. - Handle revenue and cost booking, including POC and contract completion methods. - Perform monthly P&L, balance sheet, and cash flow analysis. - Maintain accurate general ledger accounts and prepare balance sheet schedules.

Reconciliation & Compliance - Conduct AP/AR and intercompany reconciliations. - Assist with statutory, internal, and external audits by providing timely documentation.

Budgeting & Costing - Support the preparation of monthly budgets, cash flow forecasts, and variance analysis. - Prepare cost variation reports and perform revenue-cost reconciliation for ongoing projects.

Accounts Payable / Receivable - Manage vendor payments, invoice processing, and staff expense claims. - Track receivables, revenue entries, and prepare client invoices. - Monitor advances, inventory booking, asset depreciation updates, and petty cash statements.

ERP & Tools - Work extensively with SAP/Tally/ERP systems, MS Excel (advanced), Power BI, and SQL.

Preferred Skills

  • Strong knowledge of accounting standards and financial principles.
  • Proficiency in SAP/Tally/ERP applications.
  • Advanced Excel, Power BI, and SQL skills.
  • Excellent analytical, reconciliation, and problem-solving abilities.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
  • Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and meet deadlines.

Preferred Experience

  • Strong experience in FP&A.
  • Experience in financial reporting and project accounting.
  • Hands-on experience in AP/AR, bank reconciliation, and intercompany reconciliation.
  • Experience in preparing statements for audits and supporting auditors.

Why You Will Love Working With Us?

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear career growth pathways in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.
summary: Seeking a CA-qualified Finance Executive/Analyst with 2-3 years experience in FP&A, accounting, and reporting. Must be proficient in ERP systems and financial analysis.
